metadata.synopsis: Player reads "Scroll of Names" - scroll with names of all the victims that Cazador was/is planning to sacrifice.Astarion makes a comment about it.Different comment depending on Astarion's state a) Astarion is a Vampire Lord b) Astarion is Vampire Spawn c) Astarion knows about the ritual d) none of the above
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe cp_cryptclick on the scroll "Scroll of Names".

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Thousands of names. This couldn't be part of the ritual... could it?

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: I brought him so many people. So many wasted lives.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: A list of each and every soul I owe my power to. Thank you, one and all.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: He recorded thousands of names. Were they his victims or something else entirely?
